doc.field: Shr 27 cts vs 21 cts Net 988,000 vs 784,000 Nine mths Shr 82 cts Net 3,040,000 vs 2,089,000 Assets 284.2 mln vs 244.0 mln Loans 203.7 mln vs 133.5 mln Deposits 211.7 mln vs 179.5 mln NOTE: 1986 nine mths per share not available because bank did not convert to stock form until May 22, 1986.
